At PMI, we’ve chosen to do something incredible. We’re totally transforming our business and building our future on one clear purpose – to deliver a smoke-free future.

With huge change, comes huge opportunity. So, wherever you join us, you’ll enjoy the freedom to dream up and deliver better, brighter solutions and the space to move your career forward in endlessly different directions.
Your day-to-day:
- Product Strategy:
Define and maintain the product's vision, goals, and roadmap for website capabilities, web application, and Telegram Bot and leadgen tool functions
Prioritize functions and functionality based on business impact, customer feedback, and technical feasibility.
- Interaction with the backend development team:
Work closely with IT specialists and the development team to determine the technical requirements and ensure that the desired functions are supported by backend systems
Control API integration, database management, and system architecture according to business needs.
- Stakeholder management:
Act as the main point of contact between business stakeholders, IT and the development team
Communicate effectively about progress, problems, and possible solutions to all stakeholders.
- Performance monitoring and improvement:
Monitor platform performance, user experience, and key business indicators, and conduct research to find and implement improvements
Identify and proactively fix problems or identify opportunities for improvement
Build analytics and use reporting to set and monitor business goals. Using analytics to identify growth points of the lead process.
- Develop custom mechanics using current tools to support and fulfill business goals:
Active support of the brand team in creating creative and communication strategies.
- Project management:

Understanding business goals and the impact of projects on their achievement, working in a cross-functional team, calculating the effectiveness of investments in a project, communicating with a global team.
Who we're looking for:
- Proven work experience as a Product Owner, Product Manager, or in a similar role
- Deep understanding of the principles of backend development, API and system integrations
- Knowledge of Agile/Scrum methodologies
- Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills
- Analytical thinking and the ability to interpret data to make informed decisions
- Experience working with tools such as Jira, Confluence, and analytics platforms
- Knowledge of the consumer path and experience working with consumer programs
- Independence and quick learning, attention to detail and flexibility in approaches.
What we offer:
- An opportunity to pursue your ambitions and develop your skills with a global business – our staggering size and scale provides endless opportunities to progress
- An opportunity to build an international career and for cross-functional moves

- Extended social package: life insurance, insurance from critical illnesses, additional payment for preschool development of children, participation in the Employee Assistance Program (financial, psychological and legal consultations) for employees and family members, and much more

Philip Morris Kazakhstan is the holder of Top Employer Kazakhstan & Global award for 9 consecutive years as well as the only Equal Pay certificate holder in Kazakhstan, which proves our commitment to highest working standards.

Utilize your expert BI and Business analysis comprehension to contribute to international projects across a variety of business domains: finance, retail and distribution, e-commerce, life sciences & healthcare, and more.

We're in search of a proficient BI Analyst to enhance our team of professionals who steer data-driven digital transformation. If you're interested in tackling BI analysis, working with data and utilizing best business analysis practices, then this role is for you.
In this role, you will lead the planning and execution of elicitation activities, collaborating closely with business and IT stakeholders.
This position offers remote setup with the flexibility to work from any location in Kazakhstan, whether it's your home or well-equipped offices in Astana, Almaty or Karaganda.
Responsibilities
Lead stakeholder workshops to define and prioritize business needs
Translate requirements into actionable insights, fostering seamless collaboration with the delivery team throughout the project lifecycle
Perform data discovery, data assessment and data profiling using SQL queries
Prepare source to target mappings, data models and data flows
Validate prototype for business alignment using mock-ups
Conduct Sprint review sessions or User Acceptance Testing with customer stakeholders
Collaborate with customer stakeholders in designing data products
Prepare post-development and post-production materials
Requirements
5 years of experience in data-related projects (e.g. data migration, data transformation, data governance, etc.)
3 years of expertise in handling BI, DWH, Data and Analytical project requirements (gathering, documenting, presenting, estimating, prioritizing, etc.)
Experience in Data Governance
Proficiency in end-to-end data and analytics project delivery using Agile and waterfall methodologies
Expertise in defining and organizing backlogs, including epics, features, and stories
Deep understanding of the Data Modeling and Data Quality
Proficiency in performing data profiling using SQL queries and conducting data quality analysis
Experience in preparing source-to-target mappings for data ingestion, curation, and related processes
Nice to have
Experience with data on cloud platforms like Azure, AWS and GCP
Skills in creating data prototypes
Industry knowledge in finance, insurance, oil and gas, supply chain or marketing
Ability to act as a Product Owner or Data Product Owner in analytical projects

Develop escalation model where required and assist with the development of owners cost.
Perform commercial bid evaluation based on received budgetary quotations.
Consult with vendors, clients and management personnel to discuss estimates and resolve issues that may arise.

Prepare project specific cost estimating solutions without supervision in order to meet the project goals
Coordinate different cost estimating activities with project engineers
Prepare estimates for use in selecting vendors or subcontractors.
Prepare and maintain a directory of suppliers, contractors and subcontractors.
Develop and issue to market requests for quotations.
Support in Proposals Preparation and Tender Management
Prepare organization, initiation, and follow-up of the project files and documentation, including maintaining the standard project files structure on project server.

Prepare and present cost estimating information to management/customer. This may include the development of Basis of Cost Estimate report.
Responsible to implement all required cost estimating related measures to ensure quality at source
Support development estimating standards and procedures. Compiles, summarizes, updates and maintain estimate and historical cost data.
Train and mentor junior engineers
Support Project Controls Manager

Experienced in technical consulting, planning and commissioning and familiar with all phases of EPC Contracts.
Education: Bachelor's degree in engineering or economy or comparable education is minimum requirement
